data.description: retrieves positional ngrams for a large text
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The Text::Positional::Ngram returns positional ngrams and 'regular'
    ngrams from a corpus. A positional ngram is defined as a
    non-contiguous sequence of tokens (words) the corpus while a
    'regular' ngram is a contiguous sequence. The module uses an array
    of vecs to find these ngrams and their frequency counts.
